1.title: Clip: Opening & Cap Kingdom

episode of.title: Clip: Super Mario Odyssey Gameplay - Best of Gaming! (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A full guide of Super Mario Odyssey! In Super Mario Odyssey Part 1, we begin the game with an intense battle between Mario and Bowser in his wedding suit! Bowser gets the upper hand, sending Mario flying and destroying Mario's Cap! Mario meets Cappy, as they explore the Cap Kingdom and have our first boss fight against one of the Broodals (Broodal Boss Fight).
